Room.Name: Concession Stand
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing at a long counter of the concession stand.
Room.LongDescription: You can smell many delicious things being cooked here at the concession booth. You can buy both exotic and everyday foods, although the prices are a little steep. Fried bat wings, lizard shishkebab, and grizzley bear liver sautee are among the regular selection. Special orders like pork chops are not uncommon, but nonetheless expensive. A special shelf lined with candy, for the kids, should keep your sweet spot happy. Don't linger too long, you'll miss the show!
